history.text: Hey have you seen Monster's University (2013)?
I think my girls have seen it. I'm not so sure that I have.
What's it about?
You should watch it. It is a prequel of Monster's Inc, it shows how Mike and Sully started off as rivals at the same university.
Ok - is it funny?
It is 3D animated and has a few jokes in there for the adults. It is very funny.
Is it only in 3D?
Yes. It isn't the kind of 3D with glasses, it is 3D computer animated like most Pixar movies.
Oh.  Ok - so does Mike still try to scare kids in this one?
Or is it just about them being in school?
Mike is trying. He is more book smart than street smart like Sully.
Does it talk about how things are in their homes that may be different?
Like with their parents/siblings, etc.?
They are just in school until the end, it shows them where we started off in the Monsters Inc movie.
Yes, you get to see a little bit of home life and how they differ.
Many sequels/prequels aren't as good as the original - how does this one rank?
I say a 10/10. It really flows with the original.
that's unusual many times - good to hear.  Do you know if the same voice actors portray Mike and Sully?
As in Monsters Inc.
It matches the tone of the movie. The same actors do portray Mike and Sully.
Why do they not like each other at first?
They do have different voice actors to portray the younger versions, like grade school versions.
oh - i understand.
Mike is jealous of Sully because he has a natural ability to scare, whereas Mike has to study.
why are they rivals in this movie?
ah - i see!  Do they eventually work through that before the movie ends?
They are rivals because Mike is jealous of Sully and wants to beat him using his brain.
The movie ends with them as best friends heading into Monster's Inc
does anything unexpected happen in the movie?
Yes! When the dean of students expells Mike but Mike won't take no for an answer. Then creates a scare team to compete on campus.
How does that play out?

uid1response.feedback: Sounds interesting and I did enjoy the first Monster's Inc movie.

uid2response.feedback: That was fun. Please select me for future tasks. Thank you.
